Question: VCAT.AI CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
VCAT.AI

Product: VCAT.AI CES 2024 Innovation Award-winning AI service

- One-click automation for producing advertising materials
- Empowers marketers to effortlessly create vast quantities of short-form videos and banner images
- Output of 500,000 materials in just one year
- Capabilities leveraged by major South Korean e-commerce platforms
- Ambitious plans for launching a service enabling immediate posting of produced materials on social media platforms
- Future service to seamlessly manage advertising across multiple media channels
- Founded in 2019, secured Series A funding of 8 million USD in April 2023
- Specializes in the transformation of advertising content creation using advanced generative AI technology
Summary_cn:
VCAT.AI

产品：VCAT.AI CES 2024创新奖获奖的AI服务

- 一键自动化制作广告材料
- 赋予营销人员无需努力即可创建大量短视频和横幅图片的能力
- 在一年内产出50万件材料
- 受到韩国主要电商平台的青睐
- 有雄心勃勃的计划，使用户能够立即在社交媒体平台上发布制作的材料
- 未来的服务将无缝管理跨多个媒体渠道的广告
- 成立于2019年，于2023年4月获得800万美元的A轮融资
- 专注于利用先进的生成式AI技术改变广告内容创作的领域
